title: Monday Mini: Are Women Leading the Pandemic Unionization Effort?
itunes:title: Monday Mini: Are Women Leading the Pandemic Unionization Effort?
description:
Recent reports have found that young workers are increasingly supportive of unions, with organizing efforts often led by young women and non-binary folks. Tune in to find out why. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
